Analytics Bounties


Flipside is a crypto analytics company based in Boston. Their chainwalker software maps on-chain data in to a continuously updating Snowflake database that can be queried with simple sql. They run a community analytic bounty program and these are my submissions.

The list of dashboards below start with the most recent up top with my very first submission (and first time using sql) at the bottom.
Past bounty queries/charts may be refreshed for some future posts
